title: What songs you have listened in which you can prove it's copied? - Quora

response.answer_text: 1. One Love(Blue) was made into a Hindi song of the same name without any significant changes apart from lyrics. 2. Khwaabon Khwaabon (song from Force) was also almost directly copied from the Tamil song Uyiren Uyiren. 3. Kaho Na Kaho (Song from Murder) was copied from Arabic song Tamalli Ma'ak. They even kept an Arabic stanza in the Hindi version. 4. In Dildaara (song from Ra One), the entire English part was copied from an English song Stand By Me, by Ben E. King. 5. Is this Love (song from Kismat Konnection) is copied from A-Ha's Take On Me. 6. Tinak Tin Tana(Movie Mann) copied directly from Malaysian track Yang Sedang-Sedang Saja. 7. Pretty Woman (of Kal Ho Na Ho) is also copied from an English track of the same name. 8. Gupt title track is also ripped from Deep Forest (by Deep Forest). 9. Gela Gela (Aitraaz) was was almost directly copied from Thoia Thoing(R. Kelly). 10. Ye Kya Hua (dont remember album) was copied from a Bengali Song (Ae Ki Holo). 11. Tum Bin Jaaun Kahan was copied from Bengali Song Ek din paakhi ude jaabe 12. Yeh Shaan Mastaani was copied from Bengali song Aakash Kano Dhake. 13. Janeja Dhoondta Fir Raha has the same tune as Janina Tumi Kothay Cholegacho (Bengali), although both versions were by R.D. Burman, so I dont know if you call that copying.  14. Bengali song Didi is again ripped from the Arabic song Didi. These are the ones I remembered on just reading the question :P 2 more songs I remembered: 15. Daddy Cool (of Daddy Cool) copied from Daddy Cool, by Boney M. 16.I'll Do The Talking Tonight( Agent Vinod) copied from Boney M's Rasputin

It happened today .I was using Saavn app and decided to listen to some new songs .So this is what I selected.  ​ This song is called lamhein and sung by Anmoll màllik Anu màlliks daughter. Now as I started hearing this song I started to connect it with some other song.It sounded something like a song that I had heard before ..Now as it came to chorus I understood.It was this song.  ​PARADISE  by coldplay. I was really shocked because its exact replica in Hindi.(tone wise).Any other coldplay fans who have heard this?(anmol malliks version).
